entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.

text: @racheljulie @brett_mcgurk @NYGovCuomo COVID19 was coming to our shores regardless of any measures taken by USG. But the willful blindness of Trump, his lack of urgency as the scope of the threat emerged, and his contempt for scientific expertise mean that America will suffer thousands of preventable deaths.
